sn47.45:4.1: “Rightly speaking, mendicants, you’d call these four kinds of mindfulness meditation a ‘heap of the skillful’.
sn47.45:4.2: For these four kinds of mindfulness meditation are entirely a heap of the skillful.
sn47.45:5.2: It’s when a mendicant meditates by observing an aspect of the body, keen, aware, and mindful, rid of desire and aversion for the world.
sn47.45:5.3: They meditate by observing an aspect of feelings …
sn47.45:5.5: principles, keen, aware, and mindful, rid of desire and aversion for the world.
sn47.45:5.6: Rightly speaking, you’d call these four kinds of mindfulness meditation a ‘heap of the skillful’.
sn47.45:5.7: For these four kinds of mindfulness meditation are entirely a heap of the skillful.”
